com.davidbracewell.collection.counter

Class HashMapCounter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.collection.counter.HashMapCounter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the component type of the counter
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Counter<T>, Copyable<Counter<T>>, Serializable

    public class HashMapCounter<T>
extends Object
implements Counter<T>, Serializable
    Implementation of a Counter using a HashMap
    Author:
    David B. Bracewell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
